ProductInfo.Features:
GW9704H: Professional 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with HDMI & VGA. 960×480 & 30FPS recording. iPhone, Android Viewing. New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW30WD: Professional 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 42pcs IR LED, 115 ft IR Distance. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Vandal proof & water proof
Package Includes:     GW9704H DVR with 500GB HDD;     GWLED19IN  - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor;     2 x GW30WD - 1/3" Effio-E CCD Camera;
1 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC;     1 x GW100CAW: 100 feet pre-made cable BNC;     2 x GW12V0.5A: 12V0.5A Power Supply for Security Cameras.
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 2CHE1 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with 2 x Exview HAD CCD II Effio-E 700 TVL varifocal lens Security Camera, Free LED (Black/Silver)
